mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.username, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.enabled, u.reg_date, u.mod_date, u.del_yn, r.role_no, r.role_name, r.description as role_description, r.reg_date as role_reg_date, r.mod_date as role_mod_date, r.del_yn as role_del_yn, p.permission_no, p.permission_name, p.description as permission_description, p.reg_date as permission_reg_date, p.mod_date as permission_mod_date, p.del_yn as permission_del_yn FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.user_no = ur.user_no AND ur.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_no = r.role_no AND r.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_role_permission rp ON r.role_no = rp.role_no AND rp.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON rp.permission_no = p.permission_no AND p.del_yn = 'N' WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT u.user_no, u.username, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.enabled, u.reg_date, u.mod_date, u.del_yn, r.role_no, r.role_name, r.description, r.reg_date as role_reg_date, r.mod_date as role_mod_date, r.del_yn as role_del_yn FROM t_user u JOIN t_refresh_token rt ON u.user_no = rt.user_no AND rt.token = #{token} AND rt.expires_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND rt.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.user_no = ur.user_no AND ur.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_no = r.role_no AND r.del_yn = 'N' WHERE u.del_yn = 'N'
